summary.span: 從目前的 物件移除指定的存取控制規則。

span.span: Removes the specified access control rule from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用複雜的演算法可能會新增除了移除它們的 Ace，來完成存取權移除。Access removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add ACEs in addition to removing them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有現有的存取控制項目 (Ace) 符合兩者都指定這些方法移除物件和指定的存取限定詞 （允許或拒絕）。These methods remove all existing Access Control Entries (ACEs) that match both specified object and the specified access qualifier (allow or deny).
